basic.description: This course is an intensive study in intermediate graphic design. Course topics may include issues in word and image, typography, or image and production techniques. May be repeated to a maximum of twelve semester hours.
basic.subject: ART
basic.title: Media Workshop: Digital Media

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1000, ART 1201C, ART 1203, ART 1300C, ART 1602C, and ART 2003C or ART 2204C.
